The reason for this is because the two terms have a similar form, but in the error, the \(M\) term replaces the \(\displaystyle {}f''(a)\) term in the quadratic correction, where \(M\) is the maximum value of \(\displaystyle {}|f''(x)|\) on the interval \([0.9,1]\).
